Description: Head bead. Male head in opaque, light blue-green glass with suspension loop of same material. Opaque yellow face and ears with square-shaped light blue-green beard. Lips are yellow. Eyes are discs of opaque white originally with blobs of black glass now lost. The head is of cylindrical shape. The vertical opening retains a red-brown core. Fine work. Suspension loop broken.
Bibliographic references: Glass / Catalogue of Greek and Roman Glass in the British Museum (409)
